name: Left In Space
description:
You is on a space ship, which sudenlly crashes. You are on abandonned Planet which turns to be Earth and on our own one is war. You found out that only here in one of 6 laboratories you cand find medecine from a virus was developed here and now is used as a weapon. While looking for it and for space ship to live the planet, you find that there are 3 towns here where there are alive people. You found out that here in secret laboraoty "ASCLEPIUS" there are strange creatures and you have to deal with them to get home.

IMPORTANT

It`s only test mechaniks bulid (shooting, UI, some things son the level are interactable). Now development is paused, only one location avaible

Download  and run it. If somebody will like how it looks, I may continue developing it
